nodes.text: The Mandalorian: Allies & Enemies is a World of Reading Level 2 young readers book tie-in to the The Mandalorian television series. It was written by Brooke Vitale with illustrations by members of the TomatoFarm art agency and was released on December 1, 2020.
A Level 2 reader introducing all the memorable characters from the smash hit television series on Disney+, Star Wars: The Mandalorian! Includes stickers!
